meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one thousand hertz.
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts at one kilohertz.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the sound waves in kilohertz.
meanings.sent3: I can hear the kilohertz buzzing of the mosquito in my room.
meanings.sent4: The kilohertz of excitement in the air was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The kilohertz of the alarm clock woke me up abruptly.

meanings.definition: A measurement used to describe the frequency of electromagnetic waves or signals.
meanings.sent1: The technician adjusted the equipment to pick up the kilohertz of the signal.
meanings.sent2: The kilohertz of the radio waves determined the strength of the transmission.
meanings.sent3: The kilohertz of the Wi-Fi signal was so strong, it reached the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The kilohertz of emotions in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The kilohertz of the microwave signaled that my popcorn was ready.
